BetaFest
About Us

What is BetaFest?

We are a community-driven event series focused on Minecraft modding, specificly for versions before Minecraft 1.0.

Run by volunteers, BetaFest invites modders to bring new life to older versions of the game.


When is BetaFest?

Events are announced on our BlueSky and Discord server.


How to participate?

To participate in a BetaFest, you'll need to register on our Discord server after a fest is announced.

What isn't BetaFest?

Some clarifications on the non-goals of BetaFest - basically, what defines our "spirit".
NO REWARDS, JUST AN EXCUSE TO BE CREATIVE!

BetaFest isn't a contest - it's a community gathering.

We believe creativity doesn't need rewards to flourish, just an excuse to start. BetaFest is a good excuse.


Open Source

Our this website is open source.

It should go without saying, but feel free to host your own derivative events for your community or the modding community at large. BetaFest itself is a derivative event of ModFest.
